name: Commander Lorina
description: Vice-Commander of The Order of the Shield with outstanding talent
story: Lorina became an official knight after defeating a Wyvern with her spear. She aims to lead the vanguard of the Order of the Shield one day, and acts without thinking based on what she believes is right.

relations.description: A companion in the Order of the Shield and trustworthy senior knight.
Lorina has always thought she ought to emulate Crozet, and his sense of responsibility as commander of the Order of the Shield.
She's grateful to Cidd who helped her even before she became an official knight.
Dingo is always cooking food to help her become stronger. Although it's hard to know what kind of ingredients he might have used...

specialty.name: Faithful Spear
specialty.description: Through faith she can overcome moments of weakness and doubt.

type.name: Weakened
type.description: An unhealthy mind poisons the soul.

skill2.name: 精神力
skill2.desc: 攻撃する度、攻撃力が10.0%ずつUPする。最大5回累積する。

skill3.name: 螺旋突破
skill3.desc: 敵単体に攻撃し、アクションゲージを15.0%DOWNさせる。対象の現在生命力が低いほどダメージがUPする。
skill3.soul_description: 敵単体に攻撃し、アクションゲージを15.0%DOWNさせる。対象の現在生命力が低いほどダメージがUPする。
